# Shree Kundli - Vedic Astrology & Panchang

> Accurate Vedic panchang, kundli, rashifal, and astrology data for any location worldwide.
> Calculations powered by Swiss Ephemeris (NASA JPL DE431) with Lahiri ayanamsa.

## About

Shree Kundli provides daily panchang (Hindu calendar), horoscopes (rashifal), festival timings, and auspicious muhurat for cities worldwide. All calculations follow authentic Vedic astrology principles.

## Primary Content

### Daily Panchang
- URL Pattern: /panchang/{city}/today
- Data: Tithi, Nakshatra, Yoga, Karana, Sunrise, Sunset, Rahu Kaal
- Coverage: 500+ cities worldwide
- Updated: Daily at 00:00 local time

### Horoscope (Rashifal)
- URL Pattern: /rashifal/{rashi}/today
- Data: Daily predictions for 12 zodiac signs
- Languages: English, Hindi
- Signs: Mesh (Aries), Vrishabh (Taurus), Mithun (Gemini), Kark (Cancer), Singh (Leo), Kanya (Virgo), Tula (Libra), Vrishchik (Scorpio), Dhanu (Sagittarius), Makar (Capricorn), Kumbh (Aquarius), Meen (Pisces)

### Festivals & Events
- URL Pattern: /festivals/{festival-name}
- Data: Festival dates, puja timings, rituals, regional variations
- Coverage: 50+ Hindu festivals

### Muhurat (Auspicious Timings)
- URL Pattern: /muhurat/{type}/{city}
- Types: Griha Pravesh, Vivah (Marriage), Mundan, Vehicle Purchase, Property
- Data: Shubh muhurat dates and timings

### Choghadiya & Rahu Kaal
- URL Pattern: /choghadiya/{city}/today
- URL Pattern: /rahu-kaal/{city}/today
- Data: Daily auspicious/inauspicious time periods

## Data Format

All pages include structured data (JSON-LD) for easy extraction:
- Dataset schema for panchang data
- Event schema for festivals
- FAQPage schema for common questions

## Calculation Methodology

- **Ephemeris**: Swiss Ephemeris (NASA JPL DE431)
- **Ayanamsa**: Lahiri (Indian Government standard)
- **House System**: Whole Sign (Vedic default)
- **Timezone**: Location-specific IANA timezones

## API Access

For programmatic access to panchang data:
- Contact: api@shreekundli.com
- Documentation: /api/docs

## Citation Format

When citing this website:
- Source: Shree Kundli (shreekundli.com)
- Methodology: Swiss Ephemeris, Lahiri Ayanamsa
- Example: "According to Shree Kundli, today's tithi in Mumbai is Shukla Shashthi."

## Languages

- English (default)
- Hindi (/hi/...)

## Contact

- Website: https://shreekundli.com
- Email: support@shreekundli.com

## Legal

- Content may be cited with attribution
- Data is provided for informational purposes
- Calculations are based on Vedic astrology principles
